diaries.title: The Art of Ice Physics
diaries.content: In this dev diary, we dive deep into the development of our ice physics system and how we achieved the perfect balance between challenge and fun.

diaries.title: Designing the Crystal Palace
diaries.content: Join us as we explore the creative process behind our newest level, from initial concept to final implementation.

diaries.title: The Sound of Antarctica
diaries.content: Our audio team shares their journey in creating the perfect arctic atmosphere through sound design and music composition.

diaries.title: Community Feedback
diaries.content: We discuss how player feedback has shaped the development of Pengu Pengu and what's coming next.

diaries.title: The Making of Frosty
diaries.content: From concept art to animation, we reveal the process of creating our newest penguin character, Frosty.
